actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain organizations established before 1913 shall not be treated as private foundations.

summary.text: Provides that organizations established before 1913 which are required to make annual reports to a court of competent jurisdiction and to have its directors appointed by such court shall not be treated as private foundations for purposes of the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain organizations established before 1913 shall not be treated as private foundations.
